Kalaragi Jungle Glitch???
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Kalaragi Jungle Glitch???
By Anonymous on Thursday, June 21, 2007 - 02:24 pm:

I'm at the part of the storyline after you get the "junk" from the Kalaragi Jungle adventure and get a breeder liscence for Ryuwn. I went to go on an adventure one week, and I can only access Togle Caves. I've checked back in Ryuwn to see if I missed anything, and I also went to Togle to see if anything happened there. No luck. Anybody know what's up?

By Sensei Le Roof on Friday, June 22, 2007 - 07:51 am:

Not a glitch. I don't remember why, but some story element makes the Jungle unavailable... I think until you raise a monster to B rank. Check the FAQs.
